page.title: 19WYBOSTON LAKES.
page.content: {Wyboston Lakes}Golf and Leisure Park is being developed in 320 acres of Bedfordshire countryside which used to be{gravel pits}on the west bank of the {River Great Ouse.}The river and A1 road form natural boundaries for the area where an environment suitable for all ages is being created. A wide variety of activities are available, such as{golf}(18 holes/par69),{water {skiing}and{wind surfing,}and{fishing} in the three lakes or river. There is to be a ten acre{sports field}for organised family games plus an{ {adventure playground}with swings, slides and climbing structures for children. The Bedfordshire and Huntingdon Naturalist Trust are cutting a{nature trail}close to the river. A well appointed club house, with bars and a restaurant, has been built in a central position.
